overview: Panos is Senior Vice President of Finance at Upstream. Panos oversees the company’s finance and legal department and is responsible for financial planning and co-ordination of investor relations for the business. Before working with Upstream, Panos was Business Planning and Intelligence Manager at Dell where he played a key role in the company’s penetration of the corporate market. Panos has also worked in Washington D.C. as a Consultant at LECG Inc. and as an Associate at Deloitte & Touche L.L.P. He holds a Bachelor of Science in Finance and Public Policy Management from Wharton School, University of Pennsylvania and a Masters of Science in Finance and Economics from The London School of Economics and Political Science.
